page.title: 20Sarah's Day.
page.content: I wake up in the morning, wash and then dress. I go down for my breakfast and wash the dishes. l get my pack lunch ready and wait for Mary Trick. When she comes we get in her car and she drops us off at Park Rd. We walk up Dean St. and into school. The bell goes and l come in and read my book. Then we do maths. Then the bell goes and then we go out to play. We do English for an hour. Then we do P.E.at 12.30pm it's Gymnastics. Then some of us go out to our D.blocks. After about another hour or two we go home. My mum picks us up at Cockles Rise, then we go home and watch television. We have our tea and go out to play at 7.30. Then l go in and go to bed at 8.00.
